exams.name: Complete Blood Count
exams.description: Essential for a general health assessment, aiding in the identification of infections, anemias, and other hematological conditions.

exams.name: Pre-Anesthesia Consultation
exams.description: Required before any anesthetic procedure to ensure safety during surgery.

exams.name: Coagulation Profile
exams.description: To check blood coagulation and minimize bleeding risks in invasive procedures.
